text: And He is the Most Forgiving, the Most Loving,He said:This means that He is the Most Forgiving (al-Ghafūr) towards sinners, and the Most Loving (al-Wadūd) in [His] forgiveness (maghfira). He makes Himself beloved and endearing to His servants through the abundance of blessings that He has granted them, [along with] His beautifulbounties (jamīl ālāʾihi) and beneficence (iḥsān).His words, Exalted is He:
